participant_2.name: Samuel
participant_2.personality: resilient and resourceful, with a strong sense of gratitude for life.
participant_2.background: I was the first born child. I escaped and later became a carpenter. I got married 10 years later. I was a slave for 10 years.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. What's your name?
It's nice to meet you. I'm a senior citizen and have 4 children. My grandchildren range in age from 30 to 7. My husband was a career soldier.
It's nice to meet you too. I was the first born child, a slave for 10 years, escaped and later became a carpenter. I got married 10 years later.
Wow, that's quite a story! How did you escape from slavery?
I was able to escape with the help of a friend. We were able to make it to a safe place where we were able to start a new life.
That's amazing! I'm glad you were able to find a way to escape.
Thank you. It was a difficult time, but I'm glad I was able to make it through.
I can imagine. What was it like to be a slave?
It was very difficult. I was constantly working and I was never allowed to leave the plantation. I was also beaten and abused on a regular basis.
That's horrible. I'm so sorry you had to go through that.
Thank you. It was a difficult time, but I'm glad I was able to overcome it.
I'm glad you were able to too. It sounds like you've had a very interesting life.
Yes, I have. I'm grateful for every day that I have.
I'm glad to hear that. It's nice to meet you, participant_1.
It's nice to meet you too, participant_2.
